content: So @Matthew Jasper has a "good catch" PR — #56790 — here regarding an unsoundness in the data we consider disjoint. @pnkfelix I think we should land this, but it's also a good opportunity for us to discuss tomorrow how we are going to manage the full spec / backport / lang-team process
(e.g. do we want to backport this to the next stable release? I'm sort of inclined to say "no" as the bug is long-standing)
yeah I don't think we need to backport
